Name: CLOUDED VR
About the game: An interactive offbeat VR snack of about 15min. Upload your mind to the cloud and immerse yourself in a dystopian virtual holiday in the cloud hotel. In this abstract narrative experience, it is up to you to figure out the rules of the world while your attention is diverted. Original idea by Vincent Boon & Enzo Soubra, created by UNI_VERSE studio in collaboration with Antfood.
